bib.title: Selected papers from the CLARIN Annual Conference 2017, Budapest, 18--20 September 2017
bib.author: Piasecki, Maciej
bib.abstract: CLARIN ERIC (http://clarin. eu) is the European Research Infrastructure for Language Resources and Technology aimed at supporting researchers mostly from the domain of Social Sciences and Humanities (SS&H) in their use of language data and technologies
